item.title: C-EP CONSUMER SERVICES
item.description: Project Overview In 2016, new policy of deregulation of the electricity industry in Japan has begun, and a lot of new and emerging companies and startups have entered the electricity market and acquire users by user-centric services. C-EP must shift to a client first company and provide user-centered services in order to improve its retention capability. C-EP is supporting lives of families and we decided a dual-income working mother as a primary user.
